struct timeval *  current,
int  max_usecs_interval,
int  max_usecs_total 
)

Random Interval based sleeping

This function ''sleeps'' for a maximum of ``max_usecs_total`` in intervals of ``max_usecs_interval`` at the time.

Parameters:
start the start time
current the current time
max_usecs_interval maximum sleep per interval
max_usecs_total maximum total sleep
Returns:
0 SUCCESS

1 End of Period
